record.field: Cancel or Delete Non Periodic Invoices
Following products or coverages: %(name)s have tax included option which is not allowed with document rounding method.
No periods found for invoice date: %(date)s.
This contract can not be renewed because there are missing invoices on the current term.
No address available for contract: %(contract)s at period [%(start)s, %(end)s].
Impossible to post invoice "%(invoice)s" on contract "%(contract)s" which is "%(status)s".

There are %(count)s invoices with a start date before %(start)s on contract %(contract)s. Proceeding further will post those as well.
%(invoices)s

You cannot cancel this invoice. There are %(count)s invoice(s) with a start date after %(date)s on contract %(contract)s.
%(invoices)s
The copy of periodic invoices is forbidden.
The return value of the rule must be a dictionnary.
The direct debit day is invalid for this contract. The allowed days are %(allowed)s.
